# Multi-panel plots

See https://docs.juliaplots.org/latest/layouts/

## R

```{R}
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
n <- 10
x <- 1:n
plot(x, rnorm(n), type="l")
plot(x, 2*x, type="l")
plot(x, x*(x-n), type="l")
plot(x, exp(-x), type="l")
```

## Julia

```
using Plots
n = 10
x = 1:n
l = @layout[a b; c d]
a = plot(x, rand(n))
b = plot(x, 2*x)
c = plot(x, x.*(x.-n))
d = plot(x, exp.(-x))
plot(a, b, c, d, layout=l)
```
